---
title: "Operations Booklet"
---

This booklet collects operational documentation for the sequencing Shiny app, including VM rollout, LDAP, troubleshooting, and server setup.

## How to render

Render the entire booklet (all pages):

```bash
python3 booklet/update_book_sources.py
quarto render booklet/
```

The source-sync step automatically includes:

- all root-level `.qmd` files (for example `Server_preparations.qmd`, `Modifying_ngs-vm.qmd`)
- all Markdown files in `notes/*.md`

## GitHub Pages

This repository includes a GitHub Actions workflow that renders and publishes the booklet to GitHub Pages.

Expected site URL:

- `https://yeroslaviz.github.io/BCFNGS-project-management/`

## Sources

Generated chapters are written to:

- `booklet/chapters/*.qmd`

Navigation config is generated in:

- `booklet/_quarto.yml`
